frontend/index.html: Static HTML shell mounting the React app at the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Home page layout rendering Creator Zone content with a welcome header.

frontend/src/components/CreatorZoneFallb: Empty placeholder file with no content.

frontend/src/components/Dashboard.tsx: Empty placeholder file with no content.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a footer with branding and external link using icons.
frontend/src/components/FullScreenLoadin: Displays a centered full‑screen loading spinner with an optional message.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Provides the main app header with navigation, auth state handling, and admin‑aware UI logic.
frontend/src/contexts/AuthContext.tsx: Implements global auth management, idle logout, and navigation logic linked to Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, invalidating dependent queries on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login, logout, state management, and auto‑loading of stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, roles, admin status, artists, and audio submissions.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom theme variables for light and dark mode.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/pages/Studio.tsx: Studio admin page that checks auth and admin status before rendering the admin panel.
frontend/src/router.ts: Creates and exports the TanStack router instance wired to the route tree with type registration.
frontend/src/routeTree.tsx: Defines the root layout with header/footer and sets up routes for '/' and '/studio' using TanStack Router.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, typography, animations, and plugins for the frontend build.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, constraints, architecture notes, and known issues for the VAANI application.
